data.title: Language Arts
data.text:
Welcome to the English Department's website. Below, you will find contact information for individual teachers. Parents and students are encouraged to contact the appropriate teacher with specific questions or concerns. Many resources for English courses can be found on Canvas, including assignments, course calendars, and course materials. Students are encouraged to search for answers using the resources provided and to self-advocate when they have questions. We look forward to working with students!

LISD Secondary English-Language Arts Mission Statement:

Secondary ELAR in LISD develops thoughtful, critical, and discerning readers and writers who understand and respect diverse views and perspectives, appreciate the art and power of language, and are prepared to meet the literacy demands required for the future of their choice.
